title: Hope for NKH Fund
description: To support research in Non-Ketotic Hyperglycinemia (NKH) within the Department of Pediatrics, currently conducted by Dr. Van Hove, in memory of Joseph and Sophia Harris and all the other children affected by NKH.
marketingContent: To support Dr. Van Hove's research in Non-Ketotic Hyperglycinemia (NKH) within the Department of Pediatrics in memory of Joseph and Sophia Harris and all the other children affected by NKH.
